Name: Rune Break
About the game: Rune Break is a time survival game with minimalistic gameplay and Rogue-lite elements. You can't hide, You must survive and get as much gems as possible to power up your next character, Unlock Achievements, Get Skills and upgrade your abilities so you can go even further on your next run. —-- Discord Group Link —--- —-- Content in Early Access So far —--- Over 20 Skills and Abilities Over 10 Enemies In Game Achievement System Steam Achievements Upgrade System Loot & Resource System Bosses 2 Levels - For now Reward Gem - Boss/Elite Pickable Item and many more Before you begin your adventure Make sure you have some offensive skills. Grab as many exp orbs as possible. Experiment with different builds. Use elites to evolve your skills. Use various points of interest to your advantage.
